name: Jumpy Boy: Retro Brick Breaker Arcade
name_original: Jumpy Boy: Retro Brick Breaker Arcade
description:
Welcome to Jumpy Boy, the latest and greatest in brick breaking and endless jumping arcade technology. Break the bricks, the sky's the limit! In this endless jumper you gain points by breaking bricks and jumping higher. The more bricks you break in quick succession, the more points you get! Compete against the world for the highest overall score, the most bricks broken, and the greatest height achieved!

Inspired by the retro arcade and early mobile games of our youth we created this revival of the classic brick breaker model with satisfying visuals and sounds. With Jumpy Boy, you can enjoy a casual arcade experience at home or on the go.

COMING TO GOOGLE PLAY STORE 10/02/2021!!!
